product_name: Salomon XR Mission K Trail-Running Shoes - Girls'
long_description: The girl's Salomon XR Mission K trail-running shoes keep little feet comfortable mile after mile. Breathable and abrasion-resistant nylon mesh uppers feature asymmetric synthetic leather overlays that wrap and secure insteps for a precise fit. Quicklace(TM) lacing system with friction-free eyelets takes just a single pull for a perfect fit; lace pocket hides lacing away. Protective toe caps guard against bumps and abrasion. Foam insoles enhance comfort. Polyester linings quickly wick moisture away from feet and enhanced comfort. EVA midsoles cushion trail impacts. Contagrip LT(R) and Contragrip HA(R) combination outsoles provide solid traction and tenacious grip.
short_description: The girl's Salomon XR Mission K trail-running shoes keep little feet comfortable mile after mile.
